section.name: WOLips
section.p: download install wizards manipulating the build process bugs and known issues inside WOLips

subsection.name: What you need
subsection.p: WO 5.1 or above. (Setup WebObjects on Windows.)
In the case you are on a Mac: 10.2.*.

subsection.name: Expand
subsection.p: Expand com.objectstyle.wolips_*.*.*.tar.gz. The expanded folder contains 2 subfolder and this document.
The features folder contains 1 feature. There are two plugins in the plugins.

subsection.name: Install
subsection.p: Copy the content of the features folder in the Eclipse features folder and the content of the plugins folder in the Eclipse plugins folder.
On the Mac right click on Eclipse.app. Select show package contents. Navigate to Contens/Resources/Java
On Windows the feature and plugins are located in the same folder as the Eclipse.exe.

subsection.name: Update
subsection.p: Please reset the WOLips perspective after an update.
Replace "${user.home}/wobuild.properties" with "${user.home}/Library/wobuild.properties" in your build.xml files.

subsection.name: How to proceed
subsection.p: On the Mac it's normal that you have to launch Eclipse.app twice after changes to the plugins and features.
The update manager should occur. Please activate. On the mac say when Eclipse ask to relaunch and quit restart the application by hand.On other platforms just say yes.
If the welcome to WOLips doesn't open you can view the welcome under Help->Welcome.
